title: Refresh_Token
description: Holds all the refresh tokens in use

user_id.description: the ID of the user that uses this refresh token

expires.description: the time this refresh token expires

is_deleted.description: whether the record has been deleted

additional_information.description: any additional information for this record

created_at.description: when this record was created and added to db

updated_at.description: the date time of the last update of the record
